thread.title: Ultra Street Fighter II Coming to Nintendo Switch
thread.title_full: Ultra Street Fighter II Coming to Nintendo Switch

author: Terri Schwartz
title: Ultra Street Fighter II Coming to Nintendo Switch
text:
Nintendo announced that Ultimate Street Fighter II: The Final Challengers will be coming to Nintendo Switch with "a host of new features." 
The company revealed that Ultimate Street Fighter II: The Final Challengers will feature all the original fighters and bosses, Super Street Figher II characters, and new additions of Evil Ryu and Violent Ken. 
Up to two players can play simultaneously, and the second player can join "anytime, anywhere" by using the Joy-Con controller. Co-op can be played either in versus mode or to take on a CPU opponent in the new Buddy Baddle mode. 
Continue readingâ€¦
